name: HKUnit
desc: A class for managing the units of measure within HealthKit.

items.name: init(from: String)
items.desc: Returns the unit instance described by the provided string.

items.name: var unitString: String
items.desc: A string representation of the unit object.

items.name: func isNull() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the unit is null.

items.name: class func energyFormatterUnit(from: HKUnit) -> EnergyFormatter.Unit
items.desc: Converts a HealthKit unit object into a corresponding energy formatter enumeration value.

items.name: init(from: EnergyFormatter.Unit)
items.desc: Converts an energy formatter enumeration value into a corresponding HealthKit unit object.

items.name: class func lengthFormatterUnit(from: HKUnit) -> LengthFormatter.Unit
items.desc: Converts a HealthKit unit object into a corresponding length formatter enumeration value.

items.name: init(from: LengthFormatter.Unit)
items.desc: Converts a length formatter enumeration value into a corresponding HealthKit object.

items.name: class func massFormatterUnit(from: HKUnit) -> MassFormatter.Unit
items.desc: Converts a HealthKit unit object into a corresponding mass formatter enumeration value.

items.name: init(from: MassFormatter.Unit)
items.desc: Converts a mass formatter enumeration value into a corresponding HealthKit unit object.

items.name: class func gram() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring mass in grams.

items.name: class func gramUnit(with: HKMetricPrefix) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring mass, using gram units with the provided prefix.

items.name: class func ounce() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring mass in ounces.

items.name: class func pound() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring mass in pounds.

items.name: class func stone() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring mass in stones.

items.name: class func moleUnit(withMolarMass: Double) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring mass in moles for a given molar mass.

items.name: class func moleUnit(with: HKMetricPrefix, molarMass: Double) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring mass in moles, with the given prefix and molar mass.

items.name: var HKUnitMolarMassBloodGlucose: Double
items.desc: The molecular mass of blood glucose, typically used to create mole units for blood glucose.

items.name: class func meter() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring length in meters.

items.name: class func meterUnit(with: HKMetricPrefix) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring length, using meter units with the provided prefix.

items.name: class func inch() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring length in inches.

items.name: class func foot() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring length in feet.

items.name: class func yard() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring length in yards.

items.name: class func mile() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring length in miles.

items.name: class func liter() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring volume in liters.

items.name: class func literUnit(with: HKMetricPrefix) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring volume, using liter units with the provided prefix.

items.name: class func fluidOunceUS() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring volume in US fluid ounces.

items.name: class func fluidOunceImperial() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring volume in imperial fluid ounces.

items.name: class func cupUS() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring volume in US cups.

items.name: class func cupImperial() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring volume in imperial cups.

items.name: class func pintUS() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring volume in US pints.

items.name: class func pintImperial() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring volume in imperial pints.

items.name: class func pascal() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring pressure in pascals.

items.name: class func pascalUnit(with: HKMetricPrefix) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring pressure, using pascal units with the provided prefix.

items.name: class func millimeterOfMercury() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring pressure in millimeters of mercury.

items.name: class func inchesOfMercury() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring pressure in inches of mercury.

items.name: class func centimeterOfWater() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring pressure in centimeters of water.

items.name: class func atmosphere() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring pressure in atmospheres.

items.name: class func decibelAWeightedSoundPressureLevel() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring the difference between the local pressure and the ambient atmospheric pressure caused by sound.

items.name: class func second() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring time in seconds.

items.name: class func secondUnit(with: HKMetricPrefix) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring time, using second units with the provided prefix.

items.name: class func minute() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring time in minutes.

items.name: class func hour() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring time in hours.

items.name: class func day() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring time in days.

items.name: class func joule() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring energy in joules.

items.name: class func jouleUnit(with: HKMetricPrefix) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring energy, using joule units with the provided prefix.

items.name: class func kilocalorie() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring energy in kilocalories.

items.name: class func largeCalorie() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring energy in large calories (Cal).

items.name: class func smallCalorie() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring energy in small calories (cal).

items.name: class func degreeCelsius() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring temperature in degrees Celsius.

items.name: class func degreeFahrenheit() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring temperature in degrees Fahrenheit.

items.name: class func kelvin() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring temperature in kelvins.

items.name: class func decibelHearingLevel() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring the intensity of a sound.

items.name: class func hertz() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring frequency in hertz.

items.name: class func hertzUnit(with: HKMetricPrefix) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring frequency in hertz with the provided prefix.

items.name: class func siemen() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring electrical conductance in siemens.

items.name: class func siemenUnit(with: HKMetricPrefix) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring electrical conductance, using siemen units with the provided prefix.

items.name: class func volt() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring the difference in electrical potential using volts.

items.name: class func voltUnit(with: HKMetricPrefix) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring the electrical potential difference in volts with the provided prefix.

items.name: class func internationalUnit() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit that measures the amount of a biologically active substance in international units (IU).

items.name: class func count() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring counts.

items.name: class func percent() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring percentages.

items.name: func unitMultiplied(by: HKUnit) -> HKUnit
items.desc: Creates a complex unit by multiplying the receiving unit with another unit.

items.name: func unitDivided(by: HKUnit) -> HKUnit
items.desc: Creates a complex unit by dividing the receiving unit by another unit.

items.name: func unitRaised(toPower: Int) -> HKUnit
items.desc: Creates a complex unit by raising the unit to the given power.

items.name: func reciprocal() -> HKUnit
items.desc: Returns a complex unit representing the unitâ€™s reciprocal.

items.name: enum HKMetricPrefix
items.desc: Prefixes that can be added to SI units to change the order of magnitude.
